heading: HB04604
0: AN ACT DECLARING THE 7TH OF NOVEMBER OF EVERY YEAR A SPECIAL NONWORKING HOLIDAY IN THE MUNICIPALITY OF CUENCA, PROVINCE OF BATANGAS IN COMMEMORATION OF ITS FOUNDING ANNIVERSARY TO BE KNOWN AS "CUENCA FOUNDATION DAY"
